**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 101 2.0, [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 138 1.1 --- Study broadens your range of simple spells. **Prepared Caster (Cleric, Wizard, etc.)**: You can prepare two additional cantrips each day.
**Spontaneous Caster (Bard, Sorcerer, etc.)**: Add two additional cantrips from your spell list to your repertoire.
